message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $120. It's in great condition and worth a lot to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product if it's still available.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make a deal!
